Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness and procedural fairness of immigration officer's decision
Crimes.Review_Court: Federal Court (implied by judicial review context)
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Interview and assessment of marriage genuineness
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative due to unexplained discrepancies in relationship details
Evidence_Type: Inconsistent statements about meeting place, sexual relations, witnesses, activities, education
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 40(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (misrepresentation)
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to demonstrate genuine marital relationship
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Was the officer’s decision reasonable and procedurally fair?
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in testimony not adequately explained
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Upheld – applicants informed and given opportunity to respond
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant credibility concerns due to conflicting narratives
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim of memory loss; challenge based on procedural unfairness
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Adequacy of interview process and disclosure of concerns

Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage Fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness and procedural fairness of immigration officer's decision
Crimes.Review_Court: Federal Court (implied by judicial review context)
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Interview and assessment of marriage genuineness
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative due to inconsistent evidence and unexplained discrepancies
Evidence_Type: Discrepancies in statements regarding relationship history
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 40(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (misrepresentation related to marriage fraud)
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Suspected fraudulent marriage for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of credible, consistent evidence supporting genuine relationship
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to prove bona fide marriage
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Was the officer’s decision reasonable and procedurally fair?
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Upheld – proper procedures followed, interview notes sufficient
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Serious doubts about truthfulness of claims
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of procedural unfairness; inconsistent defense arguments
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose or explain key inconsistencies
